productName.title: Product Name
productName.description: Alphanumeric, 199 characters - Title of the product to be displayed on the Item Page. Your title should ideally be under 90 Characters, Maximum 100 Characters.  Anything over 90 characters will negatively impact your Search Engine Optimization (SEO). Example: Urban Shop Mesh High Back Office Desk Chair with Casters , Black
examples: Urban Shop Mesh High Back Office Desk Chair with Casters , Black

brand.title: Brand Name
brand.description: Alphanumeric, 60 characters - The name provided by the brand owner that is intended to be recognized by the consumer as represented on the product. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".  This should be the brand ONLY, not brand + product line. Make sure brand name is spelled, punctuated & capitalized properly according to the brand itself. Example: Lifestyle Solutions;Mainstays;Walnew;Winsome;Better Homes & Gardens;Flash Furniture

shortDescription.title: Site Description
shortDescription.description: Alphanumeric, 100000 characters - Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here. Example: The Lifestyle Solutions Taryn Rolled Arms Loveseat in premium black fabric is the two-seat option of this stationery set designed to fit your space and style. Built for lasting quality, the Taryn combines form, function, and ease of assembly designed for eclectic life. The design lines and scale of the Taryn loveseat bring a modern touch to spaces large and small with versatile elegance. High-density foam cushions with rolled arms and beautifully button tufted back hug your body with comfort and are poised to transform any room into your favorite place to let go of the day and relax in pure bliss. Combining black microfiber upholstered fabric and solid eucalyptus wooden frame, this durable plush loveseat invites you to rest in the knowledge of years of enjoyment to come. Symmetrically crafted and beautifully tailored tufted back cushions, the Taryn loveseat is a model of classic proportions. Sleek rolled arms will set the tone for this refined sofa set in any living space. Plush, supportive cushions with high density add maximum comfort.
examples: The Lifestyle Solutions Taryn Rolled Arms Loveseat in premium black fabric is the two-seat option of this stationery set designed to fit your space and style. Built for lasting quality, the Taryn combines form, function, and ease of assembly designed for eclectic life. The design lines and scale of the Taryn loveseat bring a modern touch to spaces large and small with versatile elegance. High-density foam cushions with rolled arms and beautifully button tufted back hug your body with comfort and are poised to transform any room into your favorite place to let go of the day and relax in pure bliss. Combining black microfiber upholstered fabric and solid eucalyptus wooden frame, this durable plush loveseat invites you to rest in the knowledge of years of enjoyment to come. Symmetrically crafted and beautifully tailored tufted back cushions, the Taryn loveseat is a model of classic proportions. Sleek rolled arms will set the tone for this refined sofa set in any living space. Plush, supportive cushions with high density add maximum comfort.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.description: Alphanumeric, 10000 characters - Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format.  Example: •;Modern rolled arm loveseat;•;Upholstered in quality polyester fabric;•;Solid hardwood frame;•;57.9"L x 31.5"W x 32.7"H; 70.7 lbs.;•;Ships in one carton: 45.7"L x 26.0"W x 21.3"H; 80.5 lbs.;•;Minimal assembly required
examples: Ships in one carton: 45.7"L x 26.0"W x 21.3"H

mainImageUrl.title: Main Image URL
mainImageUrl.description:
URL, 2500 characters - Main image of the item. File Format: JPEG (.jpg). Recommended Pixel Dimensions: 2200px x 2200px. Minimum Pixel Dimensions for Zoom 1500px x 1500px. Resolution: 300 ppi. Maximum file size: 5MB. Aspect Ratio: 1:1 (Square). Recommended File Naming: GTIN-14 digit
Image URLs should end in an image file type (.jpg) to follow best practices. They must link to a public image file that loads as an image

isProp65WarningRequired.title: Is Prop 65 Warning Required
isProp65WarningRequired.description: Closed List - Selecting "Yes" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

ageGroup.title: Age Group
ageGroup.description: Closed List - A general grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels. • Infant, 0-1 • Toddler, 1-3 • Child, 4-10 • Tween, 11-13 • Teen, 14-17 • Adult, 18-64 • Senior, 65+

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The depth of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page as length of the product. Example: 5;10;16;22

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The depth of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page as length of the product.

assembledProductLength.title: Assembled Product Depth
assembledProductLength.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The depth of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page as length of the product. Example: 5;10;16;22

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The height of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The height of the fully assembled product.

assembledProductHeight.title: Assembled Product Height
assembledProductHeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The height of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The width of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The width of the fully assembled product.

assembledProductWidth.title: Assembled Product Width
assembledProductWidth.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The width of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22

color.title: Color
color.description: Alphanumeric, 600 characters - Color refers to the actual color defined by the manufacturer. For Example, an item may be gray and black (which are used in the Color Category attribute) but the manufacturer calls the color Space Gray. Example: Sky Blue;Wonderland White;Robin-breast Red;Yum-Yum-Yellow;Red, White & Blue;Black/Hot Pink;Black;Lime Green;Multicolor;Assorted

colorCategory.title: Color Category
colorCategory.description:
Closed List - Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color(s) of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Please list all colors for the item. If the item has more than one color, please select Multi-color in addition to primary colors. Don’t list more than the three main colors.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Closed List - This refers to the state of an item, indicating its level of wear, prior use (if any), appearance, and overall quality. Availability of condition types may vary by product/category as well as by Seller eligibility per program. For more details, review this Help article: https://sellerhelp.walmart.com/seller/s/guide?language=en_US&article=000011205 .

desk_chair_type.title: Desk Chair Type
desk_chair_type.description: Closed List - This indicates the type of desk chair.

has_written_warranty.title: Has Written Warranty
has_written_warranty.description: Closed List - Indicates an item has written warranty documentation included on the product label, inside the product packaging, or a website URL or PDF available for customer review. Pursuant to California Civil Code Section 1793.01 (The Song-Beverly Consumer Warranty Act), an express warranty for consumer goods sold within California must not commence earlier than the date of delivery of the item to the consumer. If applicable, please review and update the warranty terms for this item.

isAssemblyRequired.title: Is Assembly Required
isAssemblyRequired.description: Closed List - Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

material.title: Material
material.description: Alphanumeric, 1000 characters - The main material(s) in the product. Example: Plastic; Rubber

productNetContentMeasure.title: Measure
productNetContentMeasure.description:
Decimal, 16 characters - The numeric net content portion that appears on an item. 

Please Note: If your item includes multiple items with the same UOM, add them together to get the total measurement. If the item is a set with multiple items that do not share the same UOM, list as 1 Each. Example: 1;12;32

productNetContentUnit.title: Unit
productNetContentUnit.description:
Closed List - The unit of measure as defined on the product labeling. For example, a gallon of milk has 128 Fluid Ounces: Measure = 128 and Units = Fluid Ounces.

Please Note: If your item includes multiple items with the same UOM, add them together to get the total measurement. If the item is a set with multiple items that do not share the same UOM, list as 1 Each.

netContent.title: Net Content
netContent.description:
The quantity (or quantities) of the product contained in the package along with its unit of measure typically printed on the label for the country or market where the product is sold.  For example, a gallon of milk has 128 Fluid Ounces: Measure = 128 and Units = Fluid Ounces. 

Please Note: If your item includes multiple items with the same UOM, add them together to get the total measurement. If the item is a set with multiple items that do not share the same UOM, list as 1 Each.

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 17 characters - This is the depth of a seat. Example: 5"; 10"; 2';2.5'

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - This is the depth of a seat.

seat_depth.title: Seat Depth
seat_depth.description: Decimal, 17 characters - This is the depth of a seat. Example: 5"; 10"; 2';2.5'

smallPartsWarnings.title: Small Parts Warning Code

enum: 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball

smallPartsWarnings.description: Closed List - To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0- No warning applicable; 1- Choking hazard is a small ball; 2- Choking hazard contains small ball; 3- Choking hazard contains small parts; 4- Choking hazard balloon; 5- Choking hazard is a marble; 6- Choking hazard contains a marble.

upholstered.title: Upholstered
upholstered.description: Closed List - This indicates if the furniture is covered with fabric or a padded covering.

features.title: Additional Features
features.description: Closed List - The distinguishing characteristics of a product that describe its appearance, components, and capabilities. Features often highlight the usefulness/advantages of the product to consumers. Input each feature as unique value.

productSecondaryImageURL.title: Additional Image URL
productSecondaryImageURL.description:
URL, 2500 characters - Secondary images of the item. File Format: JPEG (.jpg). Recommended Pixel Dimensions: 2200px x 2200px. Minimum Pixel Dimensions for Zoom 1500px x 1500px. Resolution: 300 ppi. Maximum file size: 5MB. Aspect Ratio: 1:1 (Square). Recommended File Naming: GTIN-14 digit
Image URLs should end in an image file type (.jpg) to follow best practices. They must link to a public image file that loads as an image

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 17 characters - The height of the arm on a dining chair, sofa, desk chair, etc. Example: 2.5 in;5 in

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The height of the arm on a dining chair, sofa, desk chair, etc.

arm_height.title: Arm Height
arm_height.description: Decimal, 17 characters - The height of the arm on a dining chair, sofa, desk chair, etc. Example: 2.5 in;5 in

arm_style.title: Arm Style
arm_style.description: Closed List - This indicates the style of the arm on a piece of furniture.

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The weight of the fully assembled product.  Example: 1.75;5;12;32

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The weight of the fully assembled product.

assembledProductWeight.title: Assembled Product Weight
assembledProductWeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The weight of the fully assembled product.  Example: 1.75;5;12;32

assemblyInstructions.title: Assembly Instructions URL
assemblyInstructions.description: URL, 2500 characters - Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name. Example: http://www.walmart.com/somepath/some-image.jpg

base_style.title: Base Style
base_style.description: Closed List - This indicates the style of the base. The base is the botton portion of the chair or stool.

prop65WarningText.title: California Prop 65 Warning Text
prop65WarningText.description: Alphanumeric, 5000 characters - This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label. If no Prop 65 warning please leave value blank for this attribute. Example: For Example: This product can expose you to chemicals including [name of one or more chemicals], which is [are] known to the State of California to cause [list associated harm(s) e.g. cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm, etc].
examples: For Example: This product can expose you to chemicals including [name of one or more chemicals], which is [are] known to the State of California to cause [list associated harm(s) e.g. cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm, etc].

cleaningCareAndMaintenance.title: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance
cleaningCareAndMaintenance.description: Alphanumeric, 5000 characters - Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained. Example: Spot Clean; Wipe with Dry Cloth; Vacuum

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: Alphanumeric, 100 characters - A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.Name of the collection that completes the whole consecutive numbered series of regular cards, inserts or hits from a particular product. Example: HERCULES Imagination;Sophia;Home;Dorm Room

countPerPack.title: Count Per Pack
countPerPack.description: Number, 10 characters - The number of identical items inside each individual package given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labeled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of 1. (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of 6. (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of 1. Example: 1;2;10;50

fabricContent.title: Fabric Content

materialName.title: Fabric Material Name
materialName.description: Alphanumeric, 4000 characters - A list of every major constituent fiber by percentage using its generic name, as is legally required for yarns, fabrics, clothing and other household items. Example: Suede, Leather, Polyester, etc.

materialPercentage.title: Fabric Material Percentage
materialPercentage.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The percentage of each fiber within the garment. Example: 20;60;75;95

fabricContent.description: The parent attribute containing: Fabric Material Name and Fabric Material Percentage. Example: 50% Cotton; 50% Polyester.

fillMaterial.title: Fill Material
fillMaterial.description: Alphanumeric, 200 characters - The material used to stuff the item (in a cushion or plush toy, for example). Example: Foam; Polyester

frameColor.title: Frame Color
frameColor.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - This indicates the color of the product's frame. Example: White;Tan;Black ;Beige;Gray;Silver

frameMaterial.title: Frame Material
frameMaterial.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - The material used in the item's frame if different than its main material makeup, which is described using the "Material" attribute. Example: Metal;Steel;Wood;Acrylic;Fabric;Faux Leather;Leather;Manufactured Wood;Upholstered;Plastic;Wicker;Bamboo

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Closed List - Indicates whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

homeDecorStyle.title: Home Decor Style
homeDecorStyle.description: Closed List - Describes home furnishings and decorations according to various themes, styles and tastes.

inflexKitComponent.title: Inflex Kit Component
inflexKitComponent.description: Closed List - If this is a component of a sellable item, select "Yes". Once you have set up all of the components of your sellable unit, reach out to your Walmart.com Merchant and ask them to group all of the item components together. Inflexible Kits must be configured and published by your Walmart Merchant.

items_included.title: Items Included
items_included.description: Alphanumeric, 200 characters - Notes what items are sold with an item and part of a set. Example: Throw Pillows; Remote; Ottoman

law_label_identification_provider.title: Law Label Identification Provider
law_label_identification_provider.description: Closed List - Name of the provider or service that assigns the Law Label registration number (e.g. Global Registration Services, Inc.).

law_label_registration_number.title: Law Label Registration Number
law_label_registration_number.description: Alphanumeric, 80 characters - The product registration number provided by the certifying organization (GRS registration number will be the same as the product's UPC).

law_label_disclosure.title: Law Label Disclosure
law_label_disclosure.description: Manages the law label content that manufacturers are legally required to display to customers purchasing bedding, upholstered furniture, quilted clothing, and other products with a hidden filling material.  This parent attribute contains an identification number assigned by a certifying organization (e.g. GRS) that provides a link with identifying information on the product display page and allows customers to view a law label prior to purchase.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer Name
manufacturer.description:
Alphanumeric, 60 characters - The name of the manufacturer.

 Example: Procter & Gamble; Apple; Sony; General Motors; Yamaha

manufacturerPartNumber.title: Manufacturer Part Number
manufacturerPartNumber.description: Alphanumeric, 60 characters - MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching. Example: 5061025; TSR-1002; 4-40-3/4-pan-phil

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Amount of weight that the item can support as certified by the manufacturer. Important safety factor to consumers and used for a wide range of products including TV mounts, automotive jacks, and vehicles. Example: 2600;1500;1000

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Amount of weight that the item can support as certified by the manufacturer. Important safety factor to consumers and used for a wide range of products including TV mounts, automotive jacks, and vehicles.

maximumLoadWeight.title: Maximum Load Weight
maximumLoadWeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Amount of weight that the item can support as certified by the manufacturer. Important safety factor to consumers and used for a wide range of products including TV mounts, automotive jacks, and vehicles. Example: 2600;1500;1000

modelNumber.title: Model Number
modelNumber.description: Alphanumeric, 60 characters - Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching. Example: G62-465DX; MFP00112BBQN

multipackQuantity.title: Multipack Quantity
multipackQuantity.description: Number, 4 characters - The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be"1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of"1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of"6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of"1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of"1." Example: 1;2;4;6

netContentStatement.title: Net Content Statement
netContentStatement.description: Alphanumeric, 500 characters - Complete product net content statement, as it appears on product packaging. Example: 6 - 5.3 OZ (150g) CUPS;1.98 Lb (900g)

pieceCount.title: Number of Pieces
pieceCount.description: Number, 17 characters - The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits.) Examples: A gift basket of 5 different items has a “Piece Count” of 5.; A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a "Piece Count" of 105.; A 500-piece puzzle has a “Piece Count” of 500. Example: 5;105;500

occasion.title: Occasion
occasion.description: Alphanumeric, 2000 characters - The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product. Example: Halloween;Christmas;Wedding;Anniversary;Back to School;Birthday;Graduation

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif. Example: Animal Print;Argyle;Floral;Geometric;Plaid;Polka Dot;Rainbow;Striped;Checked;Basketweave;Brocade;Chevron

productLine.title: Product Line
productLine.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - Product lines exist as a sub-structure of brands and, frequently, as a super-structure of models. Example: Classic;Signature Design;Series 4

recommendedLocations.title: Recommended Locations
recommendedLocations.description: Closed List - The primary location recommended for the item's use.

recommendedUses.title: Recommended Use
recommendedUses.description: Closed List - Further clarification of what the item may be used for.

restoredProductIdType.title: Restored Product ID Type
restoredProductIdType.description: Closed List - To identify the type of identifier for restored products

restoredProductId.title: Restored Product ID
restoredProductId.description: Alphanumeric, 14 characters - This code is to identify Restored Products Example: 12345678905

restoredProductIdentifier.title: Restored Product Identifier
restoredProductIdentifier.description: Specify one Restored Product ID and its ID Type.

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The seat back height from the base of the seat to the top of the back, in inches. Example: 20

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The seat back height from the base of the seat to the top of the back, in inches.

seatBackHeight.title: Seat Back Height
seatBackHeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The seat back height from the base of the seat to the top of the back, in inches. Example: 20

seat_back_height_descriptor.title: Seat Back Height Descriptor
seat_back_height_descriptor.description: Closed List - Used to describe the height back of a seat. Primarily needed for stools.

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The thickness of the back on a seat such as a desk chair, dining chair, etc.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The thickness of the back on a seat such as a desk chair, dining chair, etc.

seat_back_thickness.title: Seat Back Thickness
seat_back_thickness.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The thickness of the back on a seat such as a desk chair, dining chair, etc.

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 17 characters - The width of the back on a seat such as a desk chair, dining chair, etc.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The width of the back on a seat such as a desk chair, dining chair, etc.

seat_back_width.title: Seat Back Width
seat_back_width.description: Decimal, 17 characters - The width of the back on a seat such as a desk chair, dining chair, etc.

seat_color.title: Seat Color
seat_color.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - This is the color of the seat. Example: Ivory;Ebony;Lime;Violet;Hot Pink;Maroon;Forest;Ruby;Coral;Mocha

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The height from the floor to the top of the seat, in inches. Or, the height of a seat elevator itself. Example: 36"; 24.5"

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The height from the floor to the top of the seat, in inches. Or, the height of a seat elevator itself.

seatHeight.title: Seat Height
seatHeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The height from the floor to the top of the seat, in inches. Or, the height of a seat elevator itself. Example: 36"; 24.5"

seat_material.title: Seat Material
seat_material.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - This indicates the material of the seat. Example: Metal;Iron;Steel;Wood ;Upholstery;Manufactured Wood ;Microfiber;Linen;Velvet;Leather;Polyfiber;Faux Leather;Fabric;Cotton;Polyester;Mesh;Wicker;Plastic;Wicker;Rattan;Linen;Faux Leather;Velvet;Leather;Microfiber;Polyester;Cotton

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 17 characters - The width of the base of a seat upon which a person sits, measured in inches. Example: 22.5", 35", 16.7"

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The width of the base of a seat upon which a person sits, measured in inches.

seat_width.title: Seat Width
seat_width.description: Decimal, 17 characters - The width of the base of a seat upon which a person sits, measured in inches. Example: 22.5", 35", 16.7"

seatingCapacity.title: Seating Capacity
seatingCapacity.description: Number, 7 characters - The number of people that can be accommodated by the available seats of an item. Example: 2; 4; 8

sportsLeague.title: Sports League
sportsLeague.description: Alphanumeric, 100 characters - If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop. Example: NFL;WWE;MLB;NBA;NASCAR;USA Archery

sportsTeam.title: Sports Team
sportsTeam.description: Alphanumeric, 200 characters - If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop. Example: San Jose Earthquakes;San Jose Sharks;Golden State Warriors;Las Vegas Raiders;San Francisco 49ers;San Francisco Giants;Stanford Cardinal;Oakland Athletics

suggested_number_of_people_for_assembly.title: Suggested Number of People for Assembly
suggested_number_of_people_for_assembly.description: Number, 10 characters - Suggestion from the manufacturer for the number of people that are needed to assemble the product.  Typically used in furniture, outdoor structures, etc. Example: 1;2;3;4

thirdPartyAccreditationSymbolOnProductPa.title: Third Party Accreditation Symbol on Product Package Code

enum: Certified California Sustainable Vineyard and Winery (CCSW)

Vaad Hakashrus of Denver Scroll K Certification
Canadian Federal Government – Processed Egg Products
Gluten-free Certified: Allergen Control Group/ National Foundation for Celiac Awareness (NFCA)
Water Quality Association (WQA's)- Tested and Certified
Imported in bulk and packaged in Canada
Underwriters' Laboratory Certified, Canada "C" and U.S. US
Air cleaner performance standard e.g., humidifiers
Made in Canada from Domestic and Imported Ingredients
Organic Certifying Body – Trans Canada Organic Certification Services (TCO), Saskatchewan, Canada
International Taste & Quality (iTQi) Superior Taste Award
Kosher Grand Rabbinate of Quebec Parve
Canadian Federal Government – Dairy Product Grade
Halal Islamic Food and Nutrition Council of Canada (IFANCC)

thirdPartyAccreditationSymbolOnProductPa.description: Closed List - The code representing a symbol or marking third party accreditation on the product package.

count.title: Total Count
count.description: Number, 17 characters - The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1. Example: 1;50;100

warrantyText.title: Warranty Text
warrantyText.description: Alphanumeric, 20000 characters - Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes. Example: This warranty covers any defects in materials or workmanship, including installation, with the exceptions of fading or discoloration caused by exposure to sunlight or chemicals. This warranty runs for five years from the date your carpet is installed. Counterpoint will either replace your carpet with new carpet of similar composition and price, or refund the full purchase price of your carpet, whichever you prefer. Contact Counterpoint at 800-867-5309.
examples: This warranty covers any defects in materials or workmanship, including installation, with the exceptions of fading or discoloration caused by exposure to sunlight or chemicals. This warranty runs for five years from the date your carpet is installed. Counterpoint will either replace your carpet with new carpet of similar composition and price, or refund the full purchase price of your carpet, whichever you prefer. Contact Counterpoint at 800-867-5309.

warrantyURL.title: Warranty URL
warrantyURL.description: URL, 2500 characters - The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 5 MB. Example: http://www.walmart.com/warranty_info.pdf

variantGroupId.title: Variant Group ID
variantGroupId.description: Alphanumeric, 300 characters - Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for "Variant Group ID" and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs. Example: HANESV025

variantAttributeNames.title: Variant Attribute Names
variantAttributeNames.description: Closed List - The designated attribute by which an item is varying.

isPrimaryVariant.title: Is Primary Variant
isPrimaryVariant.description: Closed List - Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

swatchImages.title: Swatch Images

swatchImageUrl.title: Swatch Image URL
swatchImageUrl.description: URL, 2500 characters - URL of the color or pattern swatch image. This is required for products with visual variations and will be shown as a small circle on the item page. File Format: JPEG (.jpg). Recommended Pixel Dimensions: 100px x 100px. Resolution: 300 ppi. Maximum file size: 5MB. Recommended File Naming: GTIN-14 digit. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required.) Example: http://www.walmart.com/somepath/some-image.jpg

swatchVariantAttribute.title: Swatch Variant Attribute
swatchVariantAttribute.description: Closed List - Attribute name corresponding to the swatch.

swatchImages.description: Enter the swatch image location in "Swatch Image URL" and its corresponding variant attribute name in "Swatch Variant Attribute". Required for products with visual variations, like color or pattern. List the swatches in the order you recommend they appear on the site.

sku.title: SKU
sku.description: Alphanumeric, 50 characters - The string of letters and/or numbers a partner uses to identify the item. Walmart includes this value in all communications regarding item information such as orders. Example: TRVAL28726

productIdType.title: Product ID Type
productIdType.description: Closed List - UPC: GTIN-12, the 12-digit number including check-digit. If less than 12-digits, such as UPC-E which is 8-digits, add leading zeros up to 12-digits.; GTIN: GTIN-14, the 14-digit number including check-digit. If less than 14-digits add leading zeros up to 14-digits. ISBN: International Standard Book Number, the 10 or 13-digit number including check-digit.; EAN: GTIN-13, the 13-digit number including check-digit. If less than 13-digits add leading zeros up to 13-digits.

productId.title: Product ID
productId.description: Alphanumeric, 14 characters - Provide the GTIN that identifies the product's consumable (selling) unit. Expand the GTIN to 14 digits by adding preceding zeroes and check digit. A GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) is used to identify an item at any point in the Supply Chain. A GTIN refers to the data structure (not symbology) used to identify the scannable item, case, inner pack (i.e., break pack) or pallet that make up the hierarchy. Example: 00123456781011

productIdentifiers.title: Product Identifiers
productIdentifiers.description: Specify at least one Product ID and its ID Type.

price.title: Selling Price
price.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The price the customer pays for the product. Please do not use commas or currency symbols. Example: 100.33

ShippingWeight.title: Shipping Weight (lbs)
ShippingWeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The weight  including all of its packaging materials. Example: 5

stateRestrictions.title: State Restrictions

states.title: States
enum: MP - Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands
states.description: Closed List - Please list all States in which your product must and/or should be prohibited from being sold. You MUST provide us a list of all States and Zip Codes where your product is prohibited or restricted from being sold due to a law, regulation, ordinance, etc. You MAY, at your discretion, provide Walmart a list of all States and Zip Codes where you prefer to prohibit your product from being sold. Please remember that it is your obligation to understand and inform Walmart of any laws, regulations, ordinances etc. that would prohibit or restrict your product from being sold in a specific State or Zip Code.

stateRestrictionsText.title: State Restrictions Reason
stateRestrictionsText.description: Closed List - If has State Restrictions = Y, What is the reason for the State/Zip Code prohibition? Please provide an explanation as to why the product must and/or should be prohibited from being sold in the selected States/Zip Codes.

zipCodes.title: ZIP Codes
zipCodes.description: Alphanumeric, 100000 characters - Please list all Zip codes in which your product must and/or should be prohibited from being sold. You MUST provide us a list of all States and Zip Codes where your product is prohibited or restricted from being sold due to a law, regulation, ordinance, etc. You MAY, at your discretion, provide Walmart a list of all States and Zip Codes where you prefer to prohibit your product from being sold. Please remember that it is your obligation to understand and inform Walmart of any laws, regulations, ordinances, etc. that would prohibit or restrict your product from being sold in a specific State or Zip Code. Example: 94085, 94086, 94087, 72712, 72716

stateRestrictions.description: Group of attributes to capture information when there are restrictions (legal or supplier discretion) prohibiting an item's sale.

electronicsIndicator.title: Product is or Contains an Electronic Component?
electronicsIndicator.description: Closed List - Electronic is defined as item of merchandise containing a circuit board and/or electrical wiring, including but not limited to any item of merchandise with a screen.

chemicalAerosolPesticide.title: Product is or Contains a Chemical, Aerosol or Pesticide?
chemicalAerosolPesticide.description: Closed List - Indicates whether the item contains a chemical, pesticide, or aerosol. Definitions and examples can be found at: https://supplierhelp.walmart.com/s/guide?article=000007868 . If Yes, the item requires a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS.

batteryTechnologyType.title: Product is or Contains this Battery Type
batteryTechnologyType.description: Closed List - Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

fulfillmentLagTime.title: Fulfillment Lag Time
fulfillmentLagTime.description: Number, 1 characters - The time required to process the items (in days). Fulfillment Lag Time determines the number of days it takes the Seller to prepare an order for shipment. The default value is 0 if no entry is provided. If you are approved for a Lag Time Exception for 2 days or more, you will need to use the Lag Time Spec to update your items.

shipsInOriginalPackaging.title: Ships in Original Packaging
shipsInOriginalPackaging.description: Closed List - Can this product be shipped in the original packaging without being put in an outer box? Notes: 1) This is to indicate whether it's *possible* for the item to be shipped in original box, not whether it is required. 2) This was previously known as"Ships As-Is."

MustShipAlone.title: Must ship alone?
MustShipAlone.description: Closed List - Select "Yes" if your item cannot ship with another item in the same box. If marked "Yes," the ship alone item will not be grouped for ship price calculation.

IsPreorder.title: Is Preorder
IsPreorder.description: Closed List - Indicates if this item is available for preorder. Additional information will need to be provided to properly set up the preorder including Release Date. Is Preorder = Yes is REQUIRED for setting up an item as a preorder.

releaseDate.title: Release Date
releaseDate.description: Date, Provide the date that the item will be released to the public by the manufacturer. Release Date is REQUIRED for setting up an item as a preorder.  Example: yyyy-mm-dd Example: 2016-01-20

startDate.title: Site Start Date
startDate.description: DateTime, Indicates the date and time (UTC) when the item will be published on site. For preorders, this will be the date and time when the item can be Preordered by a customer. Enter hours based on military time (24-hour window, e.g. For 8PM, it will be 20 in hours) Example: yyyy-mm-dd  hh : mm : ss

endDate.title: Site End Date
endDate.description: Date, Indicates the date when the partner's item should be removed from the site. Example: yyyy-mm-dd

quantity.title: Inventory
quantity.description: Number, 17 characters - What is the inventory count? (e.g. 10)

fulfillmentCenterID.title: Fulfillment Center ID
fulfillmentCenterID.description: Alphanumeric, 100 characters - The Fulfillment Center where the SKU is physically located. If you have not defined any Fulfillment Center & operate via Default Node (Virtual) then use Virtual Node ID (which is same as your Partner ID). Example: 83746529874858434 View your fulfillment center Ids https://seller.walmart.com/settings/shipping-profile/seller-fulfillment

inventoryAvailabilityDate.title: Pre Order Available On
inventoryAvailabilityDate.description: Date, What is the date (yyyy-mm-dd) that inventory quantity will be available for Preorder? Required field for setting up inventory for a Preorder item. Leave blank for non-preorder items.

externalProductIdentifier.title: External Product Identifier

externalProductIdType.title: External Product ID Type
externalProductIdType.description: Closed List - Optional. ASIN is the Amazon Standard Identification Number. It is the unique 10-digit sequence of letters and/or numbers

externalProductId.title: External Product ID
externalProductId.description: Alphanumeric, 10 characters - Optional. Provide the ID for your “External Product ID Type”.  Example: B002Z36VJE

externalProductIdentifier.description: Closed List - Optional. Specify External Product Identifier and its ID Type if available.

ProductIdUpdate.title: Product Id Update
ProductIdUpdate.description: Closed List - Update an Item's Product ID (eg: GTIN, UPC, ISBN, ISSN, EAN). Product ID is an important identifier in Walmart systems. Walmart merges items with the same Product ID and shows them as one item sold by multiple sellers. If you provide the wrong Product ID, your item will be merged incorrectly, which can increase your order cancellation rate, create bad customer experience, produce customers fraud complaints and result in a lower rating on your Vendor Scorecard

SkuUpdate.title: SKU Update
SkuUpdate.description: Closed List - Selecting "Yes" allows the replacement of a previously submitted SKU associated with a standardized unique identifier (i.e. GTIN, ISBN, UPC, EAN) without generating an error. If "Yes" is not selected, the system will not permit the uploading of two SKUs with the same standardized unique identifier. NOTE: You should only select "Yes" if you are deliberately replacing a SKU. Selecting "Yes" in other circumstances may lead to data loss.

msrp.title: MSRP
msrp.description: Decimal, 8 characters - Manufacturer's suggested retail price. This is not the price that Walmart customers will pay for your product. You can use up to 8 digits before the decimal place. Do not use commas or dollar signs. Example: 19.95
